channel.title: The Gentleman - E/E (James Lucien) [Klavier]
channel.description:
https://soundcloud.com/eslashe/the-gentleman
A piece inspired by classical music, particularly the 3/4 time waltz. Grab your top hat and the hand of a fair lady, and prepare yourself to dance like a fine gentleman for her.
I think this one turned out quite well, and I'm proud of pushing myself to make something different for a change. And a very special thanks to HAYVN for inspiring the creation of this piece with all her fantastic piano tracks she has done.
I hope you all enjoy it. ^w^
EDIT: Song has been updated slightly.
![thegentleman|500x500](upload://8H8gpDuXOZ3ZYDQHqN9CA6csXnT.jpg)

item.title: The Gentleman - E/E (James Lucien) [Klavier]
item.dc:creator: TheRealJFalc
item.description:
I agree! It would be fantastic with a harpiscord. I mean sure, you can pitch shift some pianos up to create a mandolin sound but it’s really not anything like a harpsicord. We can only hope it’ll be eventually added in xD

Read full topic

item.title: The Gentleman - E/E (James Lucien) [Klavier]
item.dc:creator: iammane
item.description:
Friccin awesome. The only way it could be better imo would be if Auxy had a harpsichord instrument haha. Then this would be super lit.

The variation in pacing is great and the 3/4 feel is perfect. I dig it!

Read full topic

item.title: The Gentleman - E/E (James Lucien) [Klavier]
item.dc:creator: SUFOS
item.description:
Good job man! I love the style!
